bgui3d : Brown 3D VGUI Extention Library (using Coin3D)

This library provides a generic framework for displaying 3D Scene using Coin3d.

Overview

The bgui3d library provides a multiplatform viewer for 3D scenes developed with Coin3d. All the classes that can be displayed with the viewer are described at http://doc.coin3d.org/Coin/classes.html. There are multiple viewers. The fullviewer_tableau just allows you to view the scene, while the examiner_tableau allows the user to interact with the scene. Examples of how to set up and use the viewers is included in the 'examples' subdirectory.
